inclusion.criterion: Cirrhosis defined by any one of the following
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Platelet count <150,000/mm3 and AST/ALT ratio >1 in a patient with chronic liver disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Cognitive impairment on PHES aggregate score [more than or greater than] -4SD - based on norms published in Allampati et al located at the website www.encephalapp.com17
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing and able to participate, provide samples and complete follow-up
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Stable Liver function tests between 2-12 weeks prior to enrollment (can include the values established by at least two samples obtained at least 2 weeks and no more than 8-12 weeks apart)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unclear diagnosis of cirrhosis (does not meet the criteria outlined above)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Unable to consent, follow for the study duration
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Current use of psychoactive drugs apart from long-standing opioids or stable anti-depressant use.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has cirrhosis, cognitive impairment, and willing to participate. However, unclear diagnosis of cirrhosis and unable to consent are exclusion criteria.
